class.name: CVRect
class.description: The cv::Rect is the type used to represent rectangular regions.[url=https://docs.opencv.org/4.x/dc/d84/group__core__basic.html]More information here[/url].

method.name: area
method.description: Returns the area of the rect.

method.name: br
method.description: Returns the bottom right position of the rect.

method.name: contains
method.description: Checks whether the rectangle contains the point.

method.name: from_values
method.description: Returns a rect with the specified values.

method.name: set_values
method.description: Helper method used to quickly set rect values.

method.name: tl
method.description: Returns the top left position of the rect.
